name: Fresh Story
description:
Fresh Story is a visual novel about one girl's difficult journey. She will face difficulties and hard decisions to achieve a peaceful life as she dreamed.
Diana came from the suburbs to the big city to achieve success and a happy life with her boyfriend Vlad. But can they get through all the temptations and stay true to each other?



You will make decisions that will affect her level of debauchery and relationships with different people.



Immerse her in the pleasures of the big city, or keep her chaste for her lover.
